page.title: Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Network Flex Mini

revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Network Flex Mini 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 5-Port Layer 2 Gigabit Switch with PoE Input |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://store.ui.com/collections/unifi-network-switching/products/usw-flex-mini |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = UniFi Network Flex |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Mini (USW Mini 5P) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/28/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Ubiquiti_Networks_UniFi_Network_Flex_Mini |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- OUI -->
|cpu1chip1 = Nuvoton;UB10; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-M4F |cpu1spd = 192 |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Nuvoton;UB10;onchip; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 160 KiB |ram1chip = Nuvoton;UB10;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |sw2chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 5 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIExpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB (Type C) Female
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes or No --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, DC Input Half-Pitch PhotoTransistor Optocoupler;Broadcom;ACPL-217;;1;,,, N-Channel Enhancement Mode Power MOSFET;CYStech Electronics;MTE050N15BRV8;;1; |flags = PoE in |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2020 |price = 29 |upc = 817882029605 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 0XP-0068-00024 |asin = B086L7RJ3Q |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== "UBIQUITI®", "NETWORKS", and "©2020 USW_MINI_5P" :are silkscreened on the board.
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Nuvoton]] UB10 :ARM (Cortex-M4F) @192MHz :(Custom version of M487SIDAE?) *Flash: 512KB Flash (on chip), :RAM: 160KB RAM (on chip) *LAN: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports :10Gbps Switching Capacity *Power: 5V, 1A via USB (Type C) :or PoE on LAN1 port
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:UniFi Network Flex Mini Top.jpeg|Board Top File:UniFi Network Flex Mini Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
